content:
Anyone familiar with Layouts code want to check my working? https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4420

setLayoutTemplate() $region_mapping 路 Issue #4420 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug The documentation for the $region_mapping parameter of Layout::setLayoutTemplate() says: An array of region names, each keyed by the old region name and the value of the new ...
